p: The cytotoxicity effects on neem cosmetics are as presented in Table 9. DMSO in blood agar without the cosmetics was used as negative control. The neem soap produced using AISM from both the leaf and stem – bark (NMLSBS) exhibited low toxic (slight lysis) effect at 0.350 mg/ mL, while none of the cosmetics displayed acute toxic effect at less than 0.70 mg/mL on human RBC except NMLSBS.
